name: Crystalon
description:
Build - Automate - Defend. Build and explore your kingdom. Automate your resource production. Repel the ancient undead curse.

 

- Use the Download Version for the best experience -

 

CRYSTALON

Your kingdom, like many kingdoms in this world, draws its power from a crystal. The Crystalon. The legends tell, that the crystal can even be used to ascend to other plains where only wealth and pure bliss awaits. But Crystalon also holds an ancient curse. The undead ghosts from realms beyond this world are drawn to the crystal, always seeking to destroy it and everything around.

As the king it is your duty to bring wealth to your kingdom and unveil the mystery of the old legends.

::::::::::::CONTROLS::::::::::::

[WASD, ARROW KEYS] - Move camera

[B] - Open build menu (also available via build button)

[LEFT CLICK] - Interact or place building (when building is selected)

[RIGHT CLICK] - Remove building

Buildings in the building menu can also be selected by pressing enter or by double clicking

::::::::::::ABOUT:::::::::::::

This is a solo developer project. The game was developed during the Miz Jam 1 in 48 hours using the Godot Engine. All used assets are CC0 licensed.
